== Chala (CT) (627244) ==

Chala (CT) is a town in the [[Kannur]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 9.29 sq. km. and harbouring 3486 households with total population of 17088 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 10 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 502 km. Male population is 7698 and female population is 9390. Scheduled Caste population is 254 and Scheduled Tribes population is 27. Census Location Code of the town is 627244<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 75 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 109 km. Railway station is at Kannur at a distance of 10 km.
